title: Ranked Matchmaking

replies.body: I feel your pain and I think that the only way to move forward it to hope and pray that it is your enemy who gets all the noobs and not your team :) I personally think it get better as you move up through the ranks.. bronze 5 was literally the worst thing in the game but as soon as I got on a roll and started climbing things got a lot better. Trust and good luck :)

If you get trapped in bronze 5 put your account details on the board after telling your friends your leaving this one to make another account. Unless you wanna try and leave Bronze 5 but I wish you the best of luck. I personally recommend duoing with a Silver 1 or 2 so you get mixed with bronze 1 or low silver.
